name: INMediaDestinationReference
desc: An object that describes the destination for a media item.

items.name: class func library() -> Self
items.desc: Creates a new library destination for the media item.

items.name: class func playlistDestination(withName: String) -> Self
items.desc: Creates a new playlist destination for the media item.

items.name: var playlistName: String?
items.desc: The name of the playlist to which you add the media.

items.name: var mediaDestinationType: INMediaDestinationType
items.desc: The destination of the media your app adds.

items.name: enum INMediaDestinationType
items.desc: Constants that describe the different media destination types.
